lines:
1956

re lan

Andover, Mass., July 17, 1911.

Mr. Shanghai Low,

42 1-2 Harrison Ave., Boston, Mass.

Dear Sir:

The enclosed account would have been settled earlier had not 
M". Kwan been unexpectedly called home which envolved an ex -
pense which made it necessary for him to overdraw his account. 
I am arranging however a temporary loan in his behalf and hence 
am now able to send you 8. check. Kindly return the receipt and

oblige,

Very truly yours,

Principal

AES-D

Enclosure.
raw: 1956 re lan Andover, Mass., July 17, 1911. Mr. Shanghai Low, 42 1-2 Harrison Ave., Boston, Mass. Dear Sir: The enclosed account would have been settled earlier had not M". Kwan been unexpectedly called home which envolved an expense which made it necessary for him to overdraw his account. I am arranging however a temporary loan in his behalf and hence am now able to send you 8. check. Kindly return the receipt and oblige, Very truly yours, Principal AES-D Enclosure.

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter replying that Mr. Kwan incurred the expense as a result of an unexpected call home. Stearns secured a necessary loan to cover the expense and encloses a check.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
